column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Nelly - Thank you so much for the 5-star review. And also thank you for the kind words regarding our food and Daniel
column2: who has been with us for quite some time. We always appreciate hearing positive feedback about our serving staff. Above all
column4: we are most appreciative of your loyalty
column5: and we promise to maintain our consistency for any and all future visits by you.
